--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill turned his head at Redhot, and opened his mouth in an 
attempt
> to say something reasuring, but then thought better of it. He looked
> back over the horizon, towards the direction Cliffjumper headed.
> 
> Beachcomber looked up towards the sky, "Yeah, Firedrill had quite a
> creation." he mused to himself, as he began to walk towards a bushel 
of
> trees.

::REDHOT::

    The red seeker stood with his arms crossed and gave Beachcomber 
and Firedrill a curious stare.
    "Would you mind describing your creation for me?" he asked 
Firedrill. "You guys are pretty friendly...It would help if I knew 
your history so I may understand you better."


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
